body.p: A PowerHub 2 PDU can optionally be manufactured as a Manual Dual PDU. This option is currently available with WaveStar Monitoring only.
A Manual Dual PDU has two independent voltage sources, each with its own main input circuit breaker and with lock-outs provided by Kirk Keys.

In a closed transition power transfer, a “permissive signal” must be sent to the Solenoid Key Release Unit (SKRU) to unlock the SKRU key, which the operator uses to unlock a breaker and effect a power transfer.

fig.title: Manual Dual PDU Example with Doors Open
